1.title: Beat around the Bush

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Nate proposes Karenjit as soon as she signs the contract. The 2004 US presidential elections once again pits Karenjit and her mother Balwant against each other as George Bush plans on banning pornography. Ecstatic with his win, Balwant takes to the bottle which has disastrous consequences.

2.title: Guilty of doing it our way

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: The cold war brewing between Karenjit and Balwant finally leads to an explosive confrontation between the mother and daughter as they pose some rather uncomfortable questions to each other which were so far buried under the rug. Karenjit, on the other hand, decides to try something different for her business.

3.title: Is It Happily Ever After?

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Karenjit decides to grow her business by some new transitions in her business. She gets into heterosexual pornography with her fiancé Nate with whom she's all set to tie the knot with, until the events at the Halloween party pose a threat to her plans.

4.title: The Princess and The Frogs

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Knowing that her prince was always a frog, Karen breaks up with Nate and heads for the AVA awards in Vegas where she meets Daniel. Though it's sort of love at first sight, the fact that Daniel is with someone else, makes Karenjit turn on to the stand-up comedian Rusty.

5.title: The Last Wish

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: The Vohras are in Nahan, Himachal Pradesh to fulfill Balwant's desire of visiting her hometown but the circumstances that have brought them to Nahan are not something that they ever imagined or hoped for.

6.title: Time to Say Goodbye

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Daniel and Sunny find the much-needed support in each other. But the Vohra family is in a vulnerable state with a disastrous turn of events that turn their lives upside down.

1.title: Talking Tough

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Journalist Anupam Chaubey interviews Sunny Leone, one of the most googled celebrities in India, and starts on a disparaging note. Unperturbed by his tone, Sunny (Karenjit Kaur) opens about the lesser known accounts of her early childhood life.

2.title: City of No Angels

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Karenjit's family moves to Los Angeles where the rebel in teenage Karenjit begins to grow wings. From her school days in Los Angeles to the filming of her very first porn film, life moves swiftly and like an adventure for young Karenjit.

3.title: Virgin Mary

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Tired of lying to her parents and sneaking out on weekends, a 19-year-old Karenjit tells her parents upfront that she's going to a party leaving them dumbfounded. At the party, succumbing to peer pressure, Karenjit ends up losing her virginity to a guy she recently met. Meanwhile, back home, a startling revelation about her mother awaits her.

4.title: Taking the Plunge

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: When the Vohra family celebrates Raksha Bandhan at home, Karenjit breaks the news to her parents that she's going to Hollywood to shoot for a clothing brand commercial. Later, she confides in her brother that she is actually shooting for a soft porn film.

5.title: Birth of Sunny Leone

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: Moving out of her parents' house at the age of 19 to pursue a degree in pediatrics, Karenjit gets a lucrative offer to feature on the cover and centerfold of Penthouse magazine. She contemplates taking up the offer, but a rather unusual little pep talk with her university dean seals the deal for her.

6.title: The Devil Wears Nothing

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Karenjit is swamped with offers in the world of adult entertainment and she rakes in a lot of success and money, which she splurges on herself and her family. However, after she wins the Penthouse Pet of the Year in 2003, Karenjit realizes that she can't keep her line of her work a secret anymore from her parents.

7.title: As Bad As It Gets

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Karenjit, finally, gathers courage to reveal her truth to her parents. Shocked by this revelation, her parents and her best friend disown her. A dejected Karenjit is left to gather her life's broken pieces.

8.title: Love at First Sight

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: Irritated with his immaturity, Karenjit decides to dump her live-in boyfriend, Chuck. In a fortuitous moment, she meets Daniel Webber at the Adult Video Awards and the duo hit it off instantly.

9.title: The Black Sheep

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

9.plot: Ashamed of Karenjit's profession, the relatives shun the Vohra family which hurts Karenjit's parents. Following this, Karenjit's brother, Sunny decides not to apply for admission in a reputed college just to be with his emotionally disturbed parents.

10.title: A New Chapter Begins

episode of.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (TV Series 2018– )

10.plot: Karenjit's appearance on Richard Stone's radio show opens a Pandora's box leading to Karenjit's parents being ostracized by their community. However, Karenjit feels no regrets for any of her life choices, except for one. Leaving all her issues behind, Sunny Leone is set to begin a new and exciting chapter with Vivid Entertainment.

imdb.plot outline: Karenjit Kaur - Sunny Leone ki Ankahi Dastaan is a ZEE5 Hindi Original. The web series stars Sunny Leone, Raj Arjun, Rysa Saujani, Karamvir Lamba, Bijay Jasjit Anand, Grusha Kapoor, Vansh Pradhan and Marc Buckner. The biopic narrates the sensational journey of India's Most Googled celebrity star from her girl next-door image as Karenjit Kaur to the hot Sunny Leone whose videos, songs and photos made an entire generation go crazy about her. Directed by Aditya Datt, this sensational drama reveals about her history, family, boyfriend turned husband Daniel Weber and traces her transformation from an adult film star to a popular Bollywood mainstream actress.
imdb.title: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone
akas: Karenjit Kaur - The Untold Story of Sunny Leone (India)
plot: The life story of Indian-Canadian actress and former adult film star, Sunny Leone.::Anonymous
